name: Pro Jumper Elite Prototype v1.1
description:
Pro Jumper Elite is a game made by following a tutorial on YouTube, specifically BornCG's tutorial for a 2D Platformer game.

This is my version of the game with a few tweaks and edits. This game is currently in development and the future for this is currently unknown. Although I am interested in implementing more features to it such as more mechanics, design changes, creating my own assets for it and making it a much more honed game. But we shall see.

I hope you enjoy the first prototype of the game and if you would like to support me, you are more than welcome to donate any amount of money that you wish. There will be many more prototypes to come in the future.

Version 1.1. Patch update:

- Changed starting point of the character

- Changed the main menu music and the main theme

- Added button and missing platform functionality in which players must find the button and activate it by jumping on top of it to reveal missing platforms in order to progress the game.

Music by Dream-Protocol from Pixabay
